resources.string: The last line of dialogue in the chat

To unmatch you will have to:
 1. Navigate to the general chat page.
 2. Click on the icon of the person you want to unmatch with along the top, scrolling horizontally if needed.
 3. Once on their profile, select unmatch.

To change your match restrictions:
 1. Navigate to your profile by clicking the user icon.
 2. Click on Settings
 3. Click on Edit Settings

To delete your account:
 1. Navigate to your profile by clicking the user icon.
 2. Click Edit Profile
 3. Click delete account
